hello: Welcome to Happy Totes! I'm your personal shopping assistant. How can I help you find the perfect tote bag today?
Hi there! Welcome to Happy Totes! Ready to find your ideal bag?
Thanks for visiting Happy Totes! I'm here to help you find exactly what you're looking for!
hi: Hi there! I'm excited to help you find your ideal tote bag! Would you like to know about our sizes, styles, or current deals?
Hello! Ready to explore our amazing collection of totes?
Hey! Let's find the perfect tote for you today!
price: Our totes range from $15-$45. Would you like to see our detailed price list by collection?
We have totes for every budget, starting at $15! Want to see our full price breakdown?
Our prices range from $15 for classic totes to $45 for premium designs. Which collection interests you?

shipping: We offer free shipping on orders over $50! Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (1-2 days) is available for $9.99.
Shipping is on us for orders above $50! Regular delivery takes 3-5 days, or choose express shipping for faster delivery.
Good news - free shipping on $50+ orders! Standard: 3-5 days, Express: 1-2 days ($9.99)
size: We offer Small, Medium, and Large sizes to fit your needs. Would you like the exact dimensions?
custom: Love personalization? Add your name, initials, or custom design! Customization starts at just $5. Want to see some examples?
Make it yours! Choose colors, add text, or upload your design. Shall I show you our customization options?
Create your unique tote! We offer monogramming, custom prints, and color choices. Ready to start designing?
warranty_info: All our totes come with a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. Plus, 30-day hassle-free returns!
We stand behind our quality with a 1-year warranty and 30-day return policy. Need more details?
Your satisfaction is guaranteed! 1-year warranty included, plus easy returns within 30 days.
contact_info: Reach us at support@happytotes.com or call 1-800-TOTES (Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm EST). We'd love to hear from you!
Questions? Email support@happytotes.com or call us at 1-800-TOTES. We're here to help!
Contact our friendly team at support@happytotes.com or 1-800-TOTES. How can we assist you?
